title: [1.14/1.15/1.16]Miners Dream——矿工梦材质包[16x]
txt_content:
本帖最后由 8888_ 于 2020-7-26 12:56 编辑 

Miners Dream—16x材质包




miners-dream_1.png (112.33 KB, 下载次数: 4)

下载附件

2020-7-26 12:37 上传





Miners DreamMiners Dream is a 16×16 Resource pack created to putting a lot more effort than my previous Project, MazinPack 8×8,
Miners Dream材质包是一个16x材质包，它的制作比我的8x材质包付出了更多的努力。
The Packs intent is nothing more than just to be a favorable pack, It’s simplistic in some areas while others it goes a little more into detail.
这个材质包的目的无非是成为一个合适的材质包，它在一些地方是简约的，但在其他地方会有一些细节。
Miners DreamAs the Brief Introduction said, Miners Dream’s Intent is just to be favorable, like any other resource pack, except with a twist.
正如简介所说，矿工梦意图与其他材质包一样都是合意的，除了有所不同。Miners Dream offers a wide range of simplicity while also adding in details here and there.矿工梦体现出广泛的简约，同时在各处增加了一些细节。The Similarities of MazinPack is that the pack is Wierd and Wacky,此材质包与MazinPack的相似之处在于有价值和古怪的（这还有更好的翻译嘛）unlike MazinPack Intent being a simplistic 8×8, but as I said is still somewhat controlled so there aren’t any unusual textures, for example MazinPack has some textures that don’t fit in.与MazinPack的简约8x材质包不同的是，它受到了**因此没有任何异常的纹理，例如MazinPack会有一些纹理不合适准备好PVP吧  PVP ReadyThis Pack also Aims for pvp Audiences,especially those who spin 30 times before landing a bow shot from 2 blocks away and calling themselves faze,
这个材质包还面向PVP玩家，尤其是那些旋转30次然后在从2个方块之外射出弓箭并使自己慌乱的人（啥意思，我没翻译错吧2333）
hose guys are legends, no wonder they got into Faze. The Pack Includes:
他们都是传奇人物...这个材质包包括：
+ PVP Cursor with a Distinguishable red dot+带可分辨红点的PVP光标+ Thats it lol.Because not much has been added to this pack yet we still plan to add more pvp elements like low fire, and smaller particles, while also keeping it a nice pack overall.
虽然没有在这个材质包里添加太多的PVP元素，但是我们仍然计划去添加更多的PVP元素，像更少的火焰特效和较小的粒子，同时总体上保持它的美观原作者的话 （许可信息） Licensing InfoLicensing Info* You are allowed to Create Articles, YouTube Videos, or any other type of Content Containing Miners Dream.* In any Content containing Miners Dream you MUST INCLUDE THE AUTHORS CREDIT.* Porting and Redistribution containing Miners Dream is allowed but you MUST INCLUDE THE AUTHORS CREDIT.* In YouTube Videos containing Miners Dream you MUST INCLUDE A LINK TO THIS PAGE ON MCPEDL AND INCLUDE THE AUTHORS CREDIT.

*暂未翻译内容Update 0.13Update AThanks for the feedback concerning sand/sandstone, all sand-related textures have been retextured to better fit the theme.
Update BTextured Wool Textures, The Title Image, TNT, and Diamond/Emerald “Gem” Block Textures.QualityWhen It came to MazinPack, you’d basically throw a paint brush at your pc and say “ART”. MazinPack was clearly a messy pack, instead Miners Dream offers the technic called “No work? No Food.” (Joke I do eat, I don’t have a over commanding boss, and I’m very healthy, I think…). Quality In Miners Dream (Clearly shown by the title) is quite great in my perspective. I focused not only on making it good, but also going back and fixing textures that need a make-over, like a huge make-over.下载地址&支持版本：支持版本：
1.14、1.15（测试）、1.16
